entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
